dialogue.htmlContent: Hallway which leads through the apartment.
Modestly-decorated entrance hall, though large enough to have a cloak-room built into one side.
Nyan's bedroom. Light-pink walls and pastel-coloured furniture. An impressive collection of romance novels and cuddly toys. Windows look down onto the courtyard behind the apartment building.
The ensuite to Nyan's bedroom. Very large bathtub takes up almost half of the room. Windows look down onto the courtyard behind the apartment building.
A spare bedroom, fully furnished and ready for someone to use. Windows look down onto Dominion's streets.
Small bathroom, containing just a toilet and sink.
Open-plan kitchen connected to dining room. Equipped with all the latest arcane gadgets. Just like the dining room, the windows look down onto Dominion's streets.
Spacious dining room, containing several cabinets and the expected table and chairs. Windows look down onto Dominion's streets.
Lounge holds several plush sofas, each of which is covered in colourful cushions. Windows look down onto the courtyard behind the apartment building.
